mapper.sql: A.GUID, A.PUBLICSEARCHGUID, A.PRECEDENCE, A.OBJECTTYPE, A.OBJECTGUID, A.OPERREAD, A.OPERUPDATE, A.OPERDELETE, A.CREATEUSERGUID, A.CREATETIME, A.UPDATEUSERGUID, A.UPDATETIME
mapper.select: SELECT FROM SA_ACL_PUBLICSEARCH A WHERE GUID = #GUID#
mapper.update:
UPDATE SA_ACL_PUBLICSEARCH
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, PUBLICSEARCHGUID=#PUBLICSEARCHGUID#, PRECEDENCE=#PRECEDENCE#, OBJECTTYPE=#OBJECTTYPE#, OBJECTGUID=#OBJECTGUID#, OBJECTNAME=#OBJECTNAME#, OPERREAD=#OPERREAD#, OPERUPDATE=#OPERUPDATE#, OPERDELETE=#OPERDELETE#
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
